dcterms:description: A dataset containing financial articles collected during the COVID-19 pandemic, annotated for sentiment (negative, neutral, positive) based on expert evaluations.
dcterms:title: FIN-COV-NEWS

dcterms:description: A dataset used for fine-grained sentiment analysis on financial microblogs and news, containing 1647 annotated financial statements and headlines.
dcterms:title: SEMEVAL-2017

dcterms:creator: Pekka Malo
Ankur Sinha
Pekka Korhonen

dcterms:description: A dataset containing financial phrases annotated with sentiment labels (negative, neutral, positive), focusing on phrases that exhibit unanimous label decisions.
dcterms:title: Financial Phrase Bank (FINPHRASEBANK)

dcterms:creator: Jeffrey Pennington
Richard Socher

dcterms:description: A dataset providing global vectors for word representation, used for various natural language processing tasks.
dcterms:title: GloVe

dcterms:creator: Tomas Mikolov
Kai Chen
Greg Corrado
Jeffrey Dean
dcterms:description: A dataset providing efficient estimations of word representations in vector space, widely used in natural language processing.
dcterms:title: Word2Vec
